name: Interview AI
description: Interviewer.AI is all about efficiency. It’s a state-of-the-art video recruiting software that uses Explainable AI to pre-screen and shortlist candidates, bringing the best talent out there for the role you’re looking for. Our online smart video interview software cuts the time of unnecessary pre-interviews, giving you more time to focus on what’s really important – your company.
features: Making hiring equitable, explainable and efficient.
Help businesses spot high-calibre talent effortlessly.
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Headline: Asynchronous video interview software to screen better, faster.
enhanced_description: Interviewer.AI is a state-of-the-art asynchronous video recruiting software designed for efficiency. It leverages Explainable AI to pre-screen and shortlist candidates, aiming to help businesses spot high-calibre talent effortlessly. By cutting down unnecessary pre-interviews, this online smart video interview software enables organizations to hire top talent faster and more efficiently, while making the hiring process more equitable and explainable.
key_use_cases: Reducing time spent on initial interviews
Automating parts of the hiring process
competitive_advantages: Utilizes Explainable AI for pre-screening and shortlisting
Significantly reduces time spent on early-stage pre-interviews
Aims to enhance hiring efficiency and speed
Designed to make hiring more equitable and explainable
Facilitates effortless identification of high-calibre talent
roi_benefits: Potential cost savings from streamlined screening
Enhanced focus for HR and recruiters on strategic tasks
